AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: buoyant armiger member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the Buoyant Armigers, a mercenary faction of sorts working for the Tribunal Temple. After the fall of the Tribunal [PAWN_nameDef] decided that [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to explore foreign lands.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: ordinator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinator in service of the tribunal temple. [PAWN_pronoun] spent many a day watching scum, looking for any reason to lock them up.\n\nAfter the fall of the tribunal [PAWN_nameDef] decided to start [PAWN_possessive] life anew, and fled Vvardenfell.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hand of Almalexia
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't just an ordinary ordinator, [PAWN_pronoun] was on the hands of Almalexia. [PAWN_pronoun] served Almalexia with unwavering loyalty, until the very end.\n\nAfter the fall of the tribunal [PAWN_nameDef] decided to start [PAWN_possessive] life anew, and fled Mournhold.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Twin Lamps member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always thought slavery a necessary evil. [PAWN_pronoun] had a change of heart After watching an Argonian slave get beaten to near death. After that moment [PAWN_nameDef] decided to join the Twin Lamps, and vowed to do anything to protect slaves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tribunal temple member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Tribunal Temple at [PAWN_possessive] lowest point in life. Ever since then [PAWN_pronoun] has been a steadfast believer of the Tribunal, even after certain slanderous lies were spread about them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Morag Tong member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of the Morag Tong, and may still have close contacts within the faction. [PAWN_pronoun] always abided by the code, never once straying from it. After many years of faithful servitude, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to move on, and pursue [PAWN_possessive] dreams of farming ash yams.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Morag Tong member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of the Morag Tong, and may still have close contacts within the faction. [PAWN_pronoun] always abided by the code, never once straying from it. After many years of faithful servitude, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to move on, and pursue [PAWN_possessive] dreams of ranching netch.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Camonna Tong member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years in the Camonna Tong. [PAWN_pronoun] followed the strict code of 'what's yours is mine', and amassed quite the wealth because of it. Sadly, all good things must come to an end. [PAWN_nameDef] was caught, jailed, and stripped of all that hard earned wealth. After escaping [PAWN_nameDef] thought it best to find somewhere to lie low, and maybe start a new life.
